actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 1968 (Public Law 90-542), to include the Smith River, the Middle Fork and North Fork of the San Joaquin River, the Eel, Klamath, and Trinity Rivers as components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Includes, under the National Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 1968, the Smith River, the Middle Fork and North Fork of the San Joaquin River, the Eel, Klamath, and Trinity Rivers in the State of California as components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 1968 (Public Law 90-542), to include the Smith River, the Middle Fork and North Fork of the San Joaquin River, the Eel, Klamath, and Trinity Rivers as components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
